analysis.description:
EtherCup.purchase (/unique_chucks/16/0xc55e5e72911fab07ef912c58e6dc168d73348820.sol#152-187) sends eth to arbitrary user

	- oldOwner.transfer(payment) (/unique_chucks/16/0xc55e5e72911fab07ef912c58e6dc168d73348820.sol#180)

	-transfer (/unique_chucks/16/0xc55e5e72911fab07ef912c58e6dc168d73348820.sol#244-247)
